[[Version 1.1]]
*The description of Hidden Strength was changed.
**{{Color|Old description:}} Decreases <span class="bg-highlight">all party members' sprinting Stamina consumption</span> by 20%.
**{{Color|New description:}} Decreases <span class="bg-highlight">sprinting Stamina consumption of your characters in the party</span> by 20%.<br /><span class="bg-highlight">Not stackable with Passive Talents that provide the exact same effects.</span>
